com.datumbox.framework.utilities.text.extractors

Class TextExtractor<TP extends TextExtractor.Parameters,K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datumbox.framework.utilities.text.extractors.TextExtractor<TP,K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    TP -
    K -
    V -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NgramsExtractor, UniqueWordSequenceExtractor, WordSequenceExtractor

    public abstract class TextExtractor<TP extends TextExtractor.Parameters,K,V>
extends Object
    Base class for all Text exactor classes. The Text Extractors are parameterized with a Parameters class and they take as input strings.
    Author:
    Vasilis Vryniotis

    • Method Detail

      • extract

        public abstract Map<K,V> extract(String text)
        This method gets as input a string and returns a map with the result of the analysis. The type and the contents of the map depend on the implementation of the extractor. Some extractors provide the tokens (keywords) along with metrics (frequencies, occurrences, scores etc) while others return the text as a sequence of words.
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
